Package controllers

Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    APIController
    Baseclass for controller classes
    Application
    Member login, registration and password reset functions
    Circles
    functions for managing consents
    Debug
    used for debugging.
    Developers
    login and registration for developers
    FormatAPI
    used by portal to retrieve data groups
    GlobalSearch  
    Market
    functions for controlling the "market" of plugins
    Messages
    functions for a message system.
    MobileAPI
    functions for mobile APPs
    News
    functions for a "news" system.
    Plugins
    functions for managing MIDATA plugins
    PluginsAPI
    API functions to be used by MIDATA plugins
    PortalConfig
    function for reading and writing the portal configuration of each user
    Records
    functions for handling the records
    RuleApplication
    functions for finding candidates for studies.
    Spaces
    functions for managing spaces (instances of plugins)
    Studies
    functions about studies.
    Tasking
    functions for managing user tasks
    Users
    user related functions

Package controllers Description

Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests.
